description: When I was a child, I was already very curious about the world around me. I loved drawing, tinkering, and most of my sentences started with "how" or "why." At a fairly young age, I received my first video game console, and that day, something was born inside me. "How does Mario know I want him to jump?", "Why does the game crash when I do this action in that spot?", "How does this Wi-Fi thing let me play with my friends?"

When I reached my teenage years, I left my parents’ home to live in the mountains and start an apprenticeship in computer science. There, I learned about systems and networking, as well as the basics of software development. At the end of my apprenticeship, I decided to pursue more advanced studies in development, where I learned to master every aspect related to software engineering and team management (coding, DevOps, a bit of data science and cybersecurity) but most importantly, I became capable of taking on any challenge.

Today, I’m proud of the journey I’ve taken so far, but my eyes are still set on tomorrow. I keep learning in many specific fields to satisfy my curiosity, I constantly improve my home lab, and I regularly dive into ambitious projects. Because I’m passionate and because every project, every success, every greate story begins with an idea, feel free to reach out, I’d love to hear from you.
